html: Sabbath, doing no work, or refraining from the violation of festivals.— Delightful. We must not think the sabbath of the Lord a loss: (Amos viii. 5.) but rejoice in praising him, Psalm xlv. 11. (Calmet)— A word, or to apply to God's word. (Grotius)— Pious reading on holidays is the duty of all who have an opportunity. (Haydock)
